00071 volatile U8 cpt_sof;
00072 volatile U8 led_tx_flash=0;
00073 volatile U8 led_rx_flash=0;
00074 volatile U16 cpt_sof_led;
00075 
00076          S_line_coding line_coding;
00077          
00078          fap_tx_rx_struct_t buf;
00079          fap_tx_rx_struct_t* buffer=&buf;
00080

00082            
00083          U8 tx_counter;
00084          U8 rx_counter;
00085          
00086          U8 fap_Channels[]=FAP_CHANNELS;
00087          U8 wdp_pairing_address[]=WDP_PAIRING_ADDRESS;
00088

00090          U8 HWB_HOLD=0;

00093 #define Flash_tx_led()  (led_tx_flash=0,Led1_on())
00094 #define Flash_rx_led()  (led_rx_flash=0,Led0_on())

00099 void cdc_rf_task_init(void)
00100 {
00101    Leds_init();
00102    Hwb_button_init();
00103      
00104    //Init nrf24L01 driver
00105    NRF_port_init();
00106    spi_init(SPI_MASTER);   
00107 
00108    tx_counter = 0;
00109    rx_counter = 0;
00110    Usb_enable_sof_interrupt();
00111    
00112    
00113    // hardware dependant, see fap_macros.h
00114    FAP_INIT_TIMER();
00115    FAP_NRF_INIT_IRQ();
00116 
00117    
00118    //Init FAP protocol             
00119    fap_init();                       // Frequency Agility Protocol Initialisation
00120    fap_select_radio_idle_mode(FAP_STANDBY_IDLE);  // Radio in IDLE between transmissions for minimum latency
00121    fap_goto_idle_mode();
00122    fap_set_channels(fap_Channels);    // Put the frequency channels table into fap... 
00123    fap_ch_sync_enable();              // Enables the frequency channels synchroniasation
00124    fap_rx_data(0x01, 0);              // Put fap into air monitoring (pipe 0 and low latency, infinite timeout)
00125    
00126 }
00127

00130 
00135 void cdc_rf_task(void)
00136 {
00137    
00138    if(Is_device_enumerated()) // Enumeration processs OK ?
00139    {
00140 
00141       
00142       // Receive
00143       if (fap_read_rx_fifo(buffer))             // Something in receive fifo ?
00144       { 
00145         
00146         usb_send_buffer(buffer->pl,buffer->pl_length);
00147         
00148         Flash_rx_led();                         // Flashes RX led
00149       }
00150       
00151       
00152 
00153 
00154       //transmit
00155       if(usb_test_hit())
00156         {
00157             
00158           usb_read_buffer(buffer->pl,&buffer->pl_length);
00159 
00160           if (fap_tx_data(buffer,100))           // Send data to tx fifo, with a 100 period timeout
00161           {     
00162           while(fap_get_mode()!=FAP_IDLE);
00163           fap_rx_data(0x01, 0);                  // Put fap into air monitoring again (pipe 0 and low latency, infinite timeout)           
00164           Flash_tx_led();                    // Flashes TX led
00165           }
00166             
00167         }
00168          
00169 
00170       
00171       
00172       
00173       if (Is_hwb())                                     //if HWB button pressed
00174       {
00175          if (!HWB_HOLD)                                 //if HWB button was not pressed before (once operation)
00176          {
00177          //Re-Init FAP protocol (to resynchronize the dongles)            
00178          fap_init();                                    // Frequency Agility Protocol Initialisation
00179          fap_select_radio_idle_mode(FAP_STANDBY_IDLE);  // Radio in IDLE between transmissions for minimum latency
00180          fap_goto_idle_mode();    
00181          fap_set_channels(fap_Channels);                // Put the frequency channels table into fap... 
00182          fap_ch_sync_enable();                          // Enables the frequency channels synchroniasation
00183          buffer->pl_length=1;        
00184          fap_tx_data(buffer,100);                       //forces the transfer of at least one character (to make sure fap is working)       
00185          fap_rx_data(0x01, 0);                          // Put fap into air monitoring (pipe 0 and low latency, infinite timeout)
00186          Flash_rx_led(); 
00187          Flash_tx_led();
00188          HWB_HOLD=1;
00189          }
00190       }
00191       else HWB_HOLD=0;
00192           
00193  
00194       
00195    }
00196 }

00236 void sof_action()
00237 {
00238 
00239    cpt_sof++;
00240    if(led_tx_flash<=LED_FLASH_DELAY)
00241    {
00242      led_tx_flash++;
00243    }
00244    if(led_tx_flash==LED_FLASH_DELAY)
00245    {
00246       Led1_off();     
00247    }
00248    
00249    if(led_rx_flash<=LED_FLASH_DELAY)
00250    {
00251      led_rx_flash++;
00252    }
00253    if(led_rx_flash==LED_FLASH_DELAY)
00254    {
00255       Led0_off();     
00256    }
00257    
00258 
00259    if(cpt_sof_led++>=RF_LEDS_OFF_DELAY+RF_LEDS_FLASH_DELAY+1) cpt_sof_led=0;
00260    if(cpt_sof_led==RF_LEDS_OFF_DELAY)
00261    {
00262        Led0_on();
00263        Led1_on();
00264    }
00265    if(cpt_sof_led==RF_LEDS_OFF_DELAY+RF_LEDS_FLASH_DELAY)
00266    {
00267        Led0_off();
00268        Led1_off();
00269    }
00270  
00271 }
00272 
00273 
00279 bit usb_test_hit(void)
00280 {
00281   if (!rx_counter)
00282   {
00283     Usb_select_endpoint(TX_EP);
00284     if (Is_usb_receive_out())
00285     {
00286       rx_counter = Usb_byte_counter();
00287       if (!rx_counter)
00288       {
00289         Usb_ack_receive_out();
00290       }
00291     }
00292   }
00293   return (rx_counter!=0);
00294 }
00295 
00303 char usb_getchar(void)
00304 {
00305   register Uchar data_rx;
00306 
00307   Usb_select_endpoint(TX_EP);
00308   if (!rx_counter) while (!usb_test_hit());
00309   data_rx=Usb_read_byte();
00310   rx_counter--;
00311   if (!rx_counter) Usb_ack_receive_out();
00312   return data_rx;
00313 }
00314 
00315 
00321 bit usb_tx_ready(void)
00322 {
00323   if (!Is_usb_write_enabled())
00324   {
00325     return FALSE;
00326   }
00327   return TRUE;
00328 }

00331 
00339 void usb_send_buffer(U8 *buffer, U8 nb_data)
00340 {
00341    U8 zlp;
00342    
00343    // Compute if zlp required
00344    if(nb_data%RX_EP_SIZE) 
00345    { zlp=FALSE;} 
00346    else { zlp=TRUE; }
00347    
00348    Usb_select_endpoint(RX_EP);
00349    while (nb_data)
00350    {
00351       while(Is_usb_write_enabled()==FALSE); // Wait Endpoint ready
00352       while(Is_usb_write_enabled() && nb_data)
00353       {
00354          Usb_write_byte(*buffer);
00355          buffer++;
00356          nb_data--;
00357       }
00358       Usb_ack_in_ready();
00359    }
00360    if(zlp)
00361    {
00362       while(Is_usb_write_enabled()==FALSE); // Wait Endpoint ready
00363       Usb_ack_in_ready();
00364    }
00365 }
00366 
00367 
00368 
00376 void usb_read_buffer(U8 *buffer, U8 *nb_data)
00377 {
00378    
00379    *nb_data = rx_counter;                      //store the number of received data bytes
00380    
00381    Usb_select_endpoint(TX_EP); 
00382    
00383    while (rx_counter)
00384    {
00385     
00386     *buffer=Usb_read_byte();
00387     buffer++;
00388     rx_counter--;   
00389     
00390    } 
00391    
00392    Usb_ack_receive_out(); 
00393    
00394 }
